doc.name: iconGravity

syntax.example: set the iconGravity of button to position

doc.summary: Specifies wether the icon of a button is placed independently of the label.

examples.example: set the iconGravity of button "next" to "top"

description.overview: Use to iconGravity property to position the icon of a button independent of the label.

parameter.name: button
parameter.description: A reference or expression that evaluate to an button reference.

parameter.name: position
parameter.description: A string representing to desired layout of the icon of the button and is one of the following:

option.description: This property has no effect and placement of the icon follows previous engine rules.
Renders the icon at the middle left side of the button.
Renders the icon at the middle top of the button.
Renders the icon at the middle right of the button.
Renders the icon at the middle bottom of the button.
Renders the icon at the top left of the button.
Renders the icon at the top right of the button.
Renders the icon at the bottom left of the button.
Renders the icon at the bottom right of the button.
Renders the icon in the center of the button.
Stretches the icon to fill the button.

description.value: The iconGravity property return a string. By default, the iconGravity property of an button is empty.
description.comments: The margins and borderWidth are taken into account when rendering the icon - the rectangle the icon is placed in is taken to be the button rect after subtracting margins and borderWidth all the way round.
